title: FPS DROP and NOW Intermitten Lag...
body:
Since 7.24 lol often drop to 5 fps even at very low setting. I got 1 pc and 1 laptop, all have same problem..
after tweaking some setting, on my laptop now it can run at 60 fps, but it often lag.. some time when i play it kinda stop then boom i die... WTF..
stop making competition, fix your game.

replies.body: If your devices are all under the same network then your ISP or router could be having issues.  If you're on Wifi you will likely run through problems as well.  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a route to the game server: 104.160.131.1.  Run it for about 5 minutes, replace the IP address with dashes on the first two rows only, and let me know what you find.  This will help us pinpoint if the issues here are being caused by packet loss or routing problems.
Did you had a chance to see this post? https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/PIEAhqwc-fps-drop-fix?show=new
The game works perfectly fine for me. You might want to check for [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
